changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "soalition" ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, icon TEXT NOT NULL, description VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, created TIMESTAMP DEFAULT now() NOT NULL )

CREATE TABLE "follow" ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, author VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, soalition INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES soalition(id), admin BOOLEAN DEFAULT false NOT NULL, created TIMESTAMP DEFAULT now() NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE "post" ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, author VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, soalition INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES soalition(id), uri TEXT NOT NULL, created TIMESTAMP DEFAULT now() NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE "approve" ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, author VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, post INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES post(id), created TIMESTAMP DEFAULT now() NOT NULL )

CREATE TABLE "repost" ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, author VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, post INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES post(id), approved BOOLEAN DEFAULT false NOT NULL, uri TEXT NOT NULL, created TIMESTAMP DEFAULT now() NOT NULL )
